com.primary

Class Data_Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.primary.Data_Utilities

  • public class Data_Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to load data from database tables into corresponding objects of this Java program.

    • Constructor Summary

      Data_Utilities()

      Loads data into CourseInstanceIteration Object from the database based on passed in parameters.
      void load_project_data(DatabaseConnection db, CourseInstanceIteration ci_iteration)
      Loads the required project data from database into CourseInstanceIteration object's projects ArrayList based on the objects course_instance_id.
      void load_project_requirements(DatabaseConnection db, java.util.ArrayList<Project> projects)
      load_project_requirements iterates through project ArrayList and using project IDs looks for any associated skills inside the tat_project_requirements table, then fetches details of each skill based on those results, creates a corresponding ProjectSkill object and saves it to the corresponding project object's lecturer_skills ArrayList.
      void load_student_data(DatabaseConnection db, CourseInstanceIteration ci_iteration)
      Takes in database connection and CourseInstanceIteration object.
      void load_student_skills_data(DatabaseConnection db, java.util.ArrayList<Student> students)
      load_student_skils_data iterates through students ArrayList and using student ID looks for any associated skills inside the tat_user_skill, then fetches details of each skill based on those results, creates a corresponding Skill object, and saves it to the corresponding student object's skills ArrayList.
      void rerun_reset(DatabaseConnection db, CourseInstanceIteration ci_iteration)
      Clears data from the tat_project_user table related to this instances objects projects and students.
      void saveData(DatabaseConnection db, java.lang.String sql)
      Executes the passed in query string sql for the database.

    • Method Detail

      • load_course_instance_data

        public CourseInstanceIteration load_course_instance_data(DatabaseConnection db,
                                                         java.lang.String course_code,
                                                         int course_year,
                                                         java.lang.String study_period,
                                                         java.lang.String methodology,
                                                         double max_run_time)
        Loads data into CourseInstanceIteration Object from the database based on passed in parameters. db is the required database connection. course_code, course_year, study_period is required to find the specified course instance to be fetched from the database. Methodology specifies what type of allocation/balance algorithm to run, and max run time specifies the maxi_time the algorithm should run for. The function will return a CourseInstanceObject or a null value.
        Parameters:
        db - - database connection
        course_code - - String to match
        course_year - - integer to match
        study_period - - String to match
        methodology - - integer to match
        max_run_time - - double for count-down
        Returns:
        CourseInstanceIteration object, or null

      • load_student_data

        public void load_student_data(DatabaseConnection db,
                              CourseInstanceIteration ci_iteration)
        Takes in database connection and CourseInstanceIteration object. Fetches all student user data related to particular CourseInstance from database and creates Student objects which are stored in CourseInstanceIteration objects student ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        db - - database connection
        ci_iteration - - CourseInstanceIteration object

      • load_student_skills_data

        public void load_student_skills_data(DatabaseConnection db,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<Student> students)
        load_student_skils_data iterates through students ArrayList and using student ID looks for any associated skills inside the tat_user_skill, then fetches details of each skill based on those results, creates a corresponding Skill object, and saves it to the corresponding student object's skills ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        db - - database connection
        students - - ArrayList of Student objects

      • load_project_data

        public void load_project_data(DatabaseConnection db,
                              CourseInstanceIteration ci_iteration)
        Loads the required project data from database into CourseInstanceIteration object's projects ArrayList based on the objects course_instance_id.
        Parameters:
        db - - database connection
        ci_iteration - - CourseInstanceIteration object

      • load_project_requirements

        public void load_project_requirements(DatabaseConnection db,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<Project> projects)
        load_project_requirements iterates through project ArrayList and using project IDs looks for any associated skills inside the tat_project_requirements table, then fetches details of each skill based on those results, creates a corresponding ProjectSkill object and saves it to the corresponding project object's lecturer_skills ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        db - - database connection
        projects - - ArrayList of ProjectSkill objects, most likely empty

      • saveData

        public void saveData(DatabaseConnection db,
                     java.lang.String sql)
        Executes the passed in query string sql for the database.
        Parameters:
        db - - database connection
        sql - - String to process

      • rerun_reset

        public void rerun_reset(DatabaseConnection db,
                        CourseInstanceIteration ci_iteration)
        Clears data from the tat_project_user table related to this instances objects projects and students. Used in the even the lecturer/project manager re-runs the algorithm for a course instance.
        Parameters:
        db - - DatabaseConnection object
        ci_iteration - - CourseInstanceIteration object
